experiences.title: Math & CS Tutor
desc: I tutored Calculus I & II, Multivariable Calculus, intro to C, object-oriented programming, and data structures.
I helped students grasp concepts they were having trouble understanding and also assisted them with their homework.
I successfully analyzed and debugged code (C, C++, and Java) written by different individuals and provided feedback.

projects.body: Implemented an AI algorithm to win the 2048 game by achieving an average score of 2040 or greater.
